concept.title: Merchandising eVar
concept.shortdesc: Cross-category merchandising allows you to compare the relative effectiveness of multiple product categories. Typical eVars hold a single value at a time. Merchandising variables let you configure an eVar to hold multiple values.

conbody.p: Merchandising eVars let you answer questions like:

ul.li: Which product categories or search terms have the highest or lowest conversion?
Does a specific product sell better under one category versus another?

conbody.p: See Merchandising Variables for implementation information.
